title: Lexical Graphs with Natural Language Processing using NLTK
summary:
Brian will talk about his experiences using Python and NLTK
http://nltk.org/ to run language comparisons to generate lexical
difference graphs like the one mentioned in the "Lexical Distance Among
the Languages of Europe" article. http://bit.ly/1cS46Ba

The focus will be on the NLTK and how its internals work to process a
language. This talk will be his best one ever.
